items.content_html: A lightweight cross-platform solution for managing application autostart functionality in Electron apps that remains as a top window. Seamlessly enables your application to launch on system startup and stay visible above other windows across Windows, macOS, and Linux.

Seamlessly enables your application to launch on system startup and stay visible above other windows across Windows, macOS, and Linux.
